sentences.en: Although reporters know that the ostrich policy is aimed at appeasing the authorities, they still don’t like it.
sentences.cn: 尽管记者们清楚知道鸵鸟政策是为了迎合当局者，他们还是不喜欢这样。

sentences.en: An ostrich can kick a man to death.
An ostrich egg is equal in volume to 24 chicken eggs.
sentences.cn: 一枚鸵鸟蛋的体积相当于24枚鸡蛋.

sentences.en: An ostrich will stand from 2 to 2.5 meters.
sentences.cn: 鸵鸟通常身高两公尺到两公尺半.

sentences.en: An ostrich will stand from ten to twelve feet.
sentences.cn: 鸵鸟身高十到十二英尺.

sentences.en: And, curled about the brim of this confection was the perkiest of green ostrich plumes.
sentences.cn: 而且, 这件绝妙精制品的帽檐周围还装饰着洋洋得意似的驼鸟毛呢.
他们能把鸵鸟毛弄白 吗 ?

sentences.en: Conclusion The ostrich calcium phosphate ceramic had good biocompatibility to BMSCs.
sentences.cn: 结论:鸵鸟钙磷陶瓷支架具有良好的细胞相容性.

sentences.en: Face the reality. Stop being an ostrich.
sentences.cn: 面对现实吧. 不要再做逃避现实的人.

sentences.en: He could not say what a parrot or even the unmistakable ostrich was.
sentences.cn: 他说不清楚鹦鹉是什么或者连不会认错的鸵鸟也不知道。

sentences.en: His coach was green and silver, and the horses wore ostrich feathers.
sentences.cn: 他的马车漆成绿色和银色, 马头上顶着鸵鸟毛.

sentences.en: However, setting up an ostrich farm isn't something to embark on lightly.
sentences.cn: 然而建立鸵鸟农场不容易着手.

sentences.en: I've eaten ostrich meat on the continent.
sentences.cn: 我在欧洲大陆时吃过鸵鸟肉。

sentences.en: Ostrich is the fastest animal on two legs.
sentences.cn: 驼鸟是双腿跑得最快的动物.

sentences.en: She can describe an ostrich or elephant with equal felicity.
sentences.cn: 她可以用同样巧妙的言辞,描写驼鸟和大象.

sentences.en: Some Italians eat donkeys; South Africans eat ostrich.
sentences.cn: 有些意大利人吃驴；南非人吃鸵鸟。

sentences.en: The dancer wore a headdress of pink ostrich plumes.
sentences.cn: 那位舞蹈演员戴着粉色鸵鸟毛制作的头饰.
鸵鸟确实是生活在大陆上的.

trans.tran_en: a large African bird with long legs, that runs very quickly but cannot fly
